about_the_game:
Fore!

Fore Score is a fast-paced multiplayer miniature golf game, with a twist! Build the hole as you play, alternating between putting the ball and placing hazards on the course, competing to score the most points while sabotaging your friends!

Finishing the hole within the time limit will award you with points. Bonus points are awarded for finishing first, fewest strokes or hitting a hole-in-one!

Choose a golfer, then your ball, and start putting! Each round, players choose from a random selection of obstacles to modify the hole. Place down bumpers, windmills, cannons, and blocks, creating new challenges and shortcuts. First player to reach the target score will win!

Build the hole as you play

Features

  • Multiplayer fun: Supports up to four players locally or using Steam Remote Play Together

  • Unique twist: Each round, players add new obstacles to the hole to make it more challenging and chaotic for your friends

  • Easy-to-learn controls: Fore Score is designed to be accessible and fun for players of all skill levels

  • Endless possibilities: With a large variety of obstacles to choose from, no two rounds play out the same

Notice: This game is meant for multiplayer. While you could play solo against yourself with two controllers... it is meant to be enjoyed with a friend or three! Controllers are recommended but not required.
